pkg.name: heading
pkg.title: Heading
pkg.description: Headings are a typographic component that create semantic structure, allow users to scan content by creating relative visual prominence and support search engine optimisation.

scope.title: Heading
scope.description: Headings are a typographic component that create semantic structure, allow users to scan content by creating relative visual prominence and support search engine optimisation.

relatedComponents.name: list
relatedComponents.title: List
relatedComponents.description: Lists are vertical groupings of related items that can be displayed either in an unordered or ordered format.

relatedComponents.name: text
relatedComponents.title: Text
relatedComponents.description: A primitive typographic component for constrained text styles.
